/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding to the overall vibrancy of the scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the architectural details of the buildings and the verdant hues of the trees.
